title: Ukraine's president Poroshenko supports pride parade in Kiev
readable_content:
- monkeyseemonkeydoodo (2014-06-05):
  No easier way to garner popular support in the West, I suppose.

- [deleted] (2014-06-05):
  Or how about just acknowledging human rights?

- Onanymous (2014-06-05):
  Yet his pet boxer-mayor of Kiev doesn't. An empty gesture.

- draemscat (2014-06-05):
  Because that's what's really important right now.
